topic.topicDialog: To easily find content that relates to the topic you're teaching, use the handy Search feature in the Library.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, access your course by clicking on the course name on your homepage or via the Manage Courses page.
Once you've clicked on the course name, the page will automatically open on the Library.
Enter your search term into the Search field, and click on the arrow.
Your search results will then appear below.
